page.title: 04EDGEBOLTON FARM - ONE
page.content: This is a pig and arable farm.The farmers keep a hundred sows,one hundred and thirty baby{sucklers},two hundred and forty{weaners},forty{gilts {(females)}and six{boars}.They{feed} them on a mixture of wheat, barley, fish_meal,soya bean-meal, minerals and vitamins. They make their living by selling the{progeny}. They grow wheat, barley, sugar beet and oil seed rape. They have{footpaths}running across their land.They don't mind people walking on them as long as they don't wander off.They have a few ponds on their farm. They have taken down some hedges so that they can operate larger machinery and speed up the work in the fields.{ { }
